title: nf-core/hadge pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

rna_matrix_raw.errorMessage: RNA matrix raw must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.mtx'

rna_matrix_filtered.errorMessage: RNA matrix filtered must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.mtx'

hto_matrix_raw.errorMessage: HTO matrix raw must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.mtx'

hto_matrix_filtered.errorMessage: HTO matrix filtered must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.mtx'

bam.errorMessage: BAM file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

bai.errorMessage: BAM index file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam.bai'

barcodes.errorMessage: Barcodes file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tsv'

nsample.errorMessage: Number of samples must be provided and must be greater than 0

vcf_mixed.errorMessage: VCF file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf'

vcf_donor.errorMessage: VCF file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf'
